Package ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.serverClasses

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ElasticSearchResponse<T>
    Role: Holds a collection of the SimpleESResponses.
    ESRetrieval
    This class provides the necessary methods for retrieving responses from the server.
    ESUpdates
    This class provides the necessary methods for any actual modifications to stories on the server.
    Hits<T>
    Role: A container for objects from the server, in this case, SimpleESResponses.

    CODE REUSE:
    This code was taken directly from
    URL: https://github.com/rayzhangcl/ESDemo/blob/master/ESDemo/src/ca/ualberta/cs/CMPUT301/chenlei/Hits.java
    Date: Nov.
    ServerManager
    Role: Uses methods from the ESUpdates and ESRetrieval class to add, remove, update, and search for stories that have been published onto the server.
    SimpleESResponse<T>
    Role: A simple elastic search response object.
